# DebugDrawOptions

**Structure**

Types of items in a rendering that you want to debug.

## Declaration

```swift
struct DebugDrawOptions
```

## Overview

Use the [doc://com.apple.tabletopkit/documentation/TabletopKit/TabletopGame/debugDraw(options:)] method to draw a debug representation of the rendered items.

## Setting the types of items

- **drawEquipment**
- **drawSeats**
- **drawTable**

## Conforms To

- Equatable
- ExpressibleByArrayLiteral
- OptionSet
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
- SetAlgebra
title: DebugDrawOptions
